desc: Skip the Salon with 10-Day Lashes! Waterproof, Damage Free and Easy to Apply. We also sell a full range of AMAZING accessories, including the Nano-mister and Crystal Lash Curler. Fast USA Shipping. Satisfaction Guaranteed.

layout.text: WATERPROOF LASHES THAT LASTS FOR 10+ DAYS
You will keep up your gorgeous lash look for 10-days without worrying about daily falsies or running mascara again!
